name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Experienced Senior Ruby Engineer with 8 years of expertise in full-stack development. Proficient in **AWS**, alongside strong capabilities in **Docker** and **Ruby**, ensuring robust application deployment and management. I specialize in developing high-performance healthcare and financial solutions using modern technologies such as **JavaScript**, while also being familiar with **Chef**, **SAS**, and **R**. My technical proficiency extends to leading enterprise-grade platforms, integrating AI/ML capabilities, and optimizing applications for scalability and performance.

I leverage my deep understanding of cloud infrastructure, notably **AWS**, to implement continuous integration and delivery pipelines. My experience in microservices architecture and event-driven systems, paired with a focus on compliance standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS, ensures the security and reliability of applications. Additionally, I possess hands-on experience in developing machine learning workflows, supporting data-driven decision-making in production environments, and have an aptitude for leveraging tools such as MLflow and Airflow.
